title: The Vampire's Image
description: Grace is an artist who can't show anyone her work. Her art depicts things that have been forgotten, lost, or which have yet to come. The images are always beautiful--but they also drive people mad. She creates her wondrous images in secret, but one day a stranger comes...a stranger who is just as mysterious as Grace herself.The Vampire's Image is a story of paranormal romance (about 30 pages long) by bestselling author B. V. Larson.
author: B.V. Larson
